Build Identifier: 

This is similar/identical to this POP3 ticket:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=511641
the difference is only the protocol: SMTP.

Implementing SMTP PIPELINING would improve the user experience on high latency uplinks allot.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: casmls@gmail.com
